comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to cnparm.home.texas.net/Wars/Marne/MarneBios.htm "Augustin Yvon Edmond Dubail (1851-1934) - Commander of French 1st Army in Lorraine, 1914-1915; commanded Army Group East, 1915-1916. Scapegoated by Joffre for Verdun; Military Governor of Paris 1916-1918. "
